summary: Completed frontend testing of Quick Actions context menu feature on Calendar view. All 7 requested features verified and working correctly.
passed_tests: TEST 1: Right-clicking on calendar appointment shows Quick Actions context menu - PASSED
TEST 2: 'Change Status' submenu shows Scheduled, In Progress, Completed, Cancelled options with color dots - PASSED
TEST 3: Clicking a status option updates the appointment status via API and shows toast - PASSED
TEST 4: 'Reassign Walker' submenu appears for walk service appointments - PASSED
TEST 5: 'Reschedule' option opens the appointment edit dialog - PASSED
TEST 6: 'View Details' option opens the appointment detail dialog - PASSED
TEST 7: 'Cancel Appointment' option shows confirmation dialog - PASSED

test_1_context_menu.description: Right-clicking on any appointment card (data-testid='calendar-appt-{id}') triggers the Radix UI ContextMenu with 'Quick Actions' label

test_2_change_status_submenu.description: Change Status submenu shows 4 options: Scheduled (blue dot), In Progress (yellow dot), Completed (green dot), Cancelled (red dot)

test_3_status_update.description: Clicking 'In Progress' status option successfully updated appointment via API and showed toast 'Status changed to In Progress'

test_4_reassign_walker.description: Reassign Walker submenu appears only for walk services (isWalkService check). Shows 'Unassigned' and walker options with color dots

test_5_reschedule.description: Reschedule option opens the appointment edit dialog with Date, Time, Service, Walker, Status, and Notes fields

test_6_view_details.description: View Details option opens the appointment detail dialog showing service info, client info, walker info, and action buttons

test_7_cancel_appointment.description: Cancel Appointment option (shown in red) triggers window.confirm() dialog for confirmation before cancelling

code_verification.context_menu_imports: Lines 14-24 correctly import ContextMenu components from @radix-ui/react-context-menu
code_verification.quick_action_handlers: Lines 316-360 define quickAssignWalker, quickChangeStatus, quickReschedule functions
code_verification.context_menu_render: Lines 502-630 render ContextMenu with all options (Change Status, Reassign Walker, Reschedule, View Details, Cancel)
code_verification.admin_only_check: Lines 497-500 ensure context menu only appears for admin users (if (!isAdmin) return without context menu)

critical_code_review_comments: Context menu implementation uses Radix UI ContextMenu component correctly
isWalkService() helper (line 82-85) correctly filters walk services for Reassign Walker option
quickChangeStatus() (lines 326-339) properly updates status via API and shows appropriate toast message
Admin-only check (lines 497-500) correctly prevents context menu for non-admin users
context_for_next_testing_agent: Quick Actions context menu feature fully implemented and tested. Context menu appears on right-click for admin users only. All options (Change Status, Reassign Walker, Reschedule, View Details, Cancel Appointment) working correctly. Status changes show toast notifications. Reassign Walker only appears for walk services.
